import axios from'axios';const BASE_URL='http://localhost:9001';// 根据实际端口调整
export const register=data=>axios.post("".concat(BASE_URL,"/user/v1/direct/register"),data);export const login=data=>axios.post("".concat(BASE_URL,"/user/v1/direct/login"),data);export const getSubjectLinks=(staffId,token)=>axios.get("".concat(BASE_URL,"/subject/get/links"),{params:{staff_id:staffId},headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});
